Hi Guru, 
I cannot reproduce the problem on 3.3.0_20050511_1202. 
Can you describe on how to produce the problem? 

I created an adapter file via New->Other->Generic Log Adapter->Generic Log
Adapter file, wizard opened and I filled in the info with an Apache Access log
file as template file, hit Finish. Dialog prompted to switch perspective and it
switched to GLA perspective for me.

I have the following for my driver:
eclipse-SDK-3.0.2-win32.zip
emf-sdo-SDK-2.0.2.zip
xsd-SDK-2.0.2.zip
hyades.runtime_3.3.0_20050511_1202.zip
hyades.examples_3.3.0_20050511_1202.zip (optional)
hyades.test_3.3.0_20050511_1202.zip (optional)
hyadesdc.win_ia32.zip (RAC)

Hi Eugene, 
This is what I have for the drivers -- The difference seems to be the Hyades 
Run time 3.3 - April 10 build vs. your driver is May 11 build.
I will download the May 11 build and if the problem goes away then this can be 
closed.

eclipse-SDK-3.0.2-win32.zip
emf-sdo-SDK-2.0.2.zip
xsd-SDK-2.0.2.zip
hyades.runtime_3.3.0_20050410_1154.zip
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please re-open it with details if it is reproduced.
